definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Jiao1 tong1 Jian4 she4
Zhong1 guo2 Jian4 she4 Yin2 hang2

definition: Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]
pinyin: Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4
jian4 she4 xing4 de5 pi1 ping2

sentences.english: This is my first stand-alone blog , and it's still under construction.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的第一個獨立博客，還在建設中。

sentences.english: This paper talks about related problems with campus culture construction in higher institutes .
sentences.chinese: 本文對高校校園文化建設的相關問題加以論述。

sentences.english: Economic construction is an overriding task of China.
sentences.chinese: 經濟建設是中國壓倒一切的中心任務。

sentences.english: The financial restraint in rural areas is one of the bottlenecked factors in current new rural construction.
sentences.chinese: 農村金融抑制是當前新農村建設問題的瓶頸因素之一。

sentences.english: Building a concrete Koi pond is a very expensive thing to do.
sentences.chinese: 建設一個具體的錦鯉池是一個非常昂貴的事情。

sentences.english: Slip-on construction with front and rear goring for a secure, comfortable fit.
sentences.chinese: 滑上建設一個安全，舒適合腳的前部和後部戈林。

sentences.english: Everyone was working hard to construct the new China.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都努力工作建設新中國。

sentences.english: Jiangsu building work accomplished thus gave high evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 對江蘇建設工作，汪光燾給予了高度評價。

sentences.english: We are committed to carrying out settlement audit for construction engineering and calculating the construction cost impartially and fairly.
sentences.chinese: 對建設工程進行決算審計，公正公平地確定工程造價。

sentences.english: Development and ecology are two main theme in urban design and construction in Beijing nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 發展與生態是當前北京城市建設的兩大突出主題。

sentences.english: In addition, peasants are the leading part in building up the new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 農民大學生更是新農村建設的領頭雁。

sentences.english: In order to construct harmonious society, it is necessary to try to decrease the recidivism rate.
sentences.chinese: 建設和諧社會，儘量降低重新犯罪率是必要的。

sentences.english: Grasping the "Five Constructions", Promoting the "Three Services", Setting up Good Image.
sentences.chinese: 抓“五項建設”，促“三個服務”，樹良好形象。

sentences.english: The land has been confiscated and all the formalities are ready for starting construction.
sentences.chinese: 該項目土地已徵遷，各項手續齊備，可開工建設。

sentences.english: Permafrost problems are the core of the three principal technical difficulties in the Qinghai-Tibet railway construction.
sentences.chinese: 青藏鐵路建設三大技術難題的核心是凍土問題。

sentences.english: Professional building in the country with a demonstration effect.
sentences.chinese: 專業的建設在全國帶有一定的示範作用。

definition: to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to join up/to dock/a joint (between components)
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
